attributes.additional_details:
The government have gone to extreme lengths to prosecute rioters and they should be
applauded for this but they are doing nothing to prosecute white collar criminals.

The banking crisis has demonstrated that 'white collar crime' goes unpunished.
THIS MUST STOP!!!
People should be prosecuted & jailed if it is proven that they have acted in a totally irresponsible manner. Dangerous driving is basically irresponsible behaviour. Taking excessive risk while running a company/government is irresponsible also and perpetrators should be jailed.
